con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="RealTimeDSR" targetNamespace="http://realtime247.eu/realtime247/dsr" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://realtime247.eu/realtime247/dsr" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:ns2="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" xmlns:ns1="urn:eu:nets:realtime247:dsr:real.2021.03.01"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:eu:nets:realtime247:dsr:real.2021.03.01" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="urn:eu:nets:realtime247:dsr:real.2021.03.01"> <xs:element name="SendDirectSettlementReportRequest" type="tns:DirectSettlementReport"/> <xs:element name="SendDirectSettlementReportResponse" type="tns:DirectSettlementReportReceipt"/> <xs:complexType name="DirectSettlementReport"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="MessageId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="SendingId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ReceivingId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ServiceId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="TestCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ClearingDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="CycleName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="AccumulatedAmountSettled" type="tns:ActiveCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="ReportForFinancialInstitution" type="tns:ReportForFinancialInstitution"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ActiveCurrencyAndAmount"> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:decimal"> <xs:attribute name="Ccy" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ReportForFinancialInstitution"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="AccumulatedAmountSettled" type="tns:ActiveCurrencyAndAmount"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="financialInstitutionId" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="type" type="tns:ReportType"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="DirectSettlementReportReceipt"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="OriginalMessageId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="SendingId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ReceivingId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="TestCode" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="TestCodeType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Test"/> <xs:enumeration value="Prod"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ReportType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="INST"/> <xs:enumeration value="BULK"/> <xs:enumeration value="EBA"/> <xs:enumeration value="TIPS"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="SendDirectSettlementReport"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:SendDirectSettlementReportRequest" name="sendDirectSettlementReportRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SendDirectSettlementReportResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:SendDirectSettlementReportResponse" name="sendDirectSettlementReportResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="RealTimeDSRPortType"> <wsdl:operation name="SendDirectSettlementReport"> <wsdl:input message="tns:SendDirectSettlementReport" name="SendDirectSettlementReport"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:SendDirectSettlementReportResponse" name="SendDirectSettlementReportResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="RealTimeDSRSoapBinding" type="tns:RealTimeDSRPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="SendDirectSettlementReport"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="SendDirectSettlementReport"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="SendDirectSettlementReportResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="RealTimeDSR"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:RealTimeDSRSoapBinding" name="RealTimeDSRPortType"> <soap:address location="https://ebs-nic-srv-daemon-s1.apps.os-global.finods.com/nic/services/RealTimeDSR"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
